meanings.definition: The capacity to gain an accurate and deep understanding of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: Her insights into human behavior helped solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use data to gather insights into the natural world.
meanings.sent3: His insights into cat behavior were surprisingly helpful.
meanings.sent4: The artist's insights into color were truly eye-opening.
meanings.sent5: The detective's insights into the case were invaluable.

meanings.definition: The act or result of apprehending the inner nature of things or of seeing intuitively.
meanings.sent1: The psychic claimed to have insights into the future.
meanings.sent2: Meditation can lead to profound insights into oneself.
meanings.sent3: Her insights into the stock market were eerily accurate.
meanings.sent4: The poet's insights into love were beautifully expressed.
meanings.sent5: The philosopher's insights into existence were thought-provoking.
